quiz.title: Multiplying Binomials
quiz.subtitle: Unit 10 Quiz 4: FOIL Method and Area Models
quiz.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: What does FOIL stand for when multiplying binomials?
questions.explanation: FOIL is an acronym for First terms, Outer terms, Inner terms, Last terms - the order in which you multiply terms when multiplying two binomials.

questions.question: Multiply: $(x + 3)(x + 5)$
questions.explanation: FOIL method: First: $x \cdot x = x^2$. Outer: $x \cdot 5 = 5x$. Inner: $3 \cdot x = 3x$. Last: $3 \cdot 5 = 15$. Combine: $x^2 + 5x + 3x + 15 = x^2 + 8x + 15$.

questions.question: Multiply: $(2x - 1)(x + 4)$
questions.explanation: FOIL: First: $2x \cdot x = 2x^2$. Outer: $2x \cdot 4 = 8x$. Inner: $-1 \cdot x = -x$. Last: $-1 \cdot 4 = -4$. Combine: $2x^2 + 8x - x - 4 = 2x^2 + 7x - 4$.

questions.question: Multiply: $(y - 3)(y - 2)$
questions.explanation: FOIL: First: $y \cdot y = y^2$. Outer: $y \cdot (-2) = -2y$. Inner: $-3 \cdot y = -3y$. Last: $-3 \cdot (-2) = 6$. Combine: $y^2 - 2y - 3y + 6 = y^2 - 5y + 6$.

questions.question: Which shows the correct area model for $(x+4)(x+2)$?
questions.explanation: Area model breaks into four parts: $x \cdot x = x^2$, $x \cdot 2 = 2x$, $4 \cdot x = 4x$, $4 \cdot 2 = 8$. Combine: $x^2 + 2x + 4x + 8 = x^2 + 6x + 8$.

questions.question: Multiply: $(3m + 2)(m - 5)$
questions.explanation: FOIL: First: $3m \cdot m = 3m^2$. Outer: $3m \cdot (-5) = -15m$. Inner: $2 \cdot m = 2m$. Last: $2 \cdot (-5) = -10$. Combine: $3m^2 - 15m + 2m - 10 = 3m^2 - 13m - 10$.

questions.question: What is the product of $(x+7)(x-7)$?
questions.explanation: This is a difference of squares pattern: $(a+b)(a-b) = a^2 - b^2$. Here: $(x+7)(x-7) = x^2 - 7^2 = x^2 - 49$.

questions.question: Find the area of a rectangle with length $(x+6)$ and width $(x-2)$
Which binomial multiplication results in $y^2 + 10y + 24$?
questions.explanation: We need factors of 24 that add to 10. $4 \times 6 = 24$ and $4 + 6 = 10$, so $(y+4)(y+6) = y^2 + 10y + 24$. Check: $y^2 + 6y + 4y + 24 = y^2 + 10y + 24$.

scoreMessages.90: Excellent! You've mastered binomial multiplication using FOIL, area models, and recognizing special patterns like difference of squares.
scoreMessages.70: Strong binomial multiplication skills! Focus on: 1) Systematic FOIL application, 2) Careful sign management, 3) Recognizing patterns to simplify, 4) Combining like terms accurately.
scoreMessages.50: Good progress with binomials. Practice: 1) Writing out all four FOIL terms, 2) Double-checking signs with negatives, 3) Organizing work in area models, 4) Factoring to check products.
scoreMessages.0: Start with FOIL: First × First, Outer × Outer, Inner × Inner, Last × Last. Combine like terms. Watch signs carefully. Area models can help visualize the four products.
